content.text: Eeropha was a planet in the Eeropha system of the Colonies. It was orbited by the moon Nierport VII.
It was a major refueling station for ships destined for Coruscant. It was represented in the Galactic Senate by native Sano Sauro.

elements.text: Jedi Quest: The Master of Disguise
The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, Vol. II, p. 379
